text: FC Dynamo Kostroma () is an association football club from Kostroma, Russia, founded in 1926. It played in 2010 and 2011–12 seasons, in the Russian Second Division. ==External links== *Profile on 2liga.ru Category:Association football clubs established in 1926 Category:Football clubs in Russia Category:Sport in Kostroma Category:1926 establishments in Russia
title: FC Dynamo Kostroma
